description:
Some California lawmakers are trying to make it a crime to defend yourself and your property against criminals who break into your home. This is why Riverside County Sheriff Chad Bianco is warning homeowners of the potential purge that is to come.

Riverside County Sheriff Bianco issues a warning to CA residents that Democrats have put a bill out that defends a criminal who breaks into your home.

Yes, you heard that right. If you stand your ground in CA and k*ll a criminal in your home, you will be the one arrested. pic.twitter.com/0DHTciomNr
— Liberacrat™️ (@Liberacrat) April 27, 2025
title: CA Sheriff issues DIRE warning to citizens about the new Democrat bill that defends criminals breaking into your home

description:
The media claims voters are turning on Trump, but that could not be further from the truth. Today’s show breaks down what the numbers really say.

According to ABC, “Trump has the lowest 100-day job approval rating of any president in the past 80 years.”

Anywhere from 57% to 67% of Americans said they disapprove of Trump's performance on six of seven issues tested in this survey, including at least 6 in 10 on his handling of stock market volatility, tariffs, foreign relations and the economy overall.

Fewer, 53%, said they disapprove of his handling of immigration.
title: Watch: There is No Trump Buyer's Remorse! Why the New Poll Numbers are a Psyop...

description:
The last administration handled the Southern Border so badly that it’s hard to justify it through incompetence. This is why Tom Homan slammed Biden for being “the first president in the history of this nation who came into office and unsecured the border on purpose.”

During Monday’s press briefing, Homan acknowledged the destruction caused by Biden’s open border policies and touted the Trump administration's success in the massive drop in illegal immigration.

Tom Homan on the success of Trump's border policies:

"President Biden is the first president in the history of this nation who came into office and un-secured the border on purpose... Today, we have the most secure border in the history of this nation." pic.twitter.c
title: Trump border czar Tom Homan shuts down media over why he's so "emotional" about illegal immigration

description:
Apparently, the American mind can’t comprehend…we don’t know. Something European, we guess. We’re not sure Europe should be bragging about their cigarette addiction. India and Pakistan are on the brink of war. New information has come out about the January 29th helicopter crash at Ronald Reagan Airport. President Donald Trump took flak for wearing a blue suit to the Pope’s funeral and the media is claiming Trump voters are turning on him. But what do the numbers say? Let’s find out.

title: Sources: No, Americans Are NOT Turning On Trump

description:
As we approach Donald Trump's 100th day in office, by far the most popular thing he has done is the common-sense illegal immigration reform to end the Biden Border Crisis. The one where, much like Biden's cognitive decline, "now it can be told," Biden let in more illegals than anyone before him. We all knew the media attack was going to be arbitrary sob stories, which yesterday meant the allegation that children were deported. I'll let Marco Rubio and Tom Homan explain how that's bullplop.

But first, as is necessary with any article that deals with how hard Democrats and media (but I repeat myself) simp for illegal immigration and combat Trump's agenda to deport them, it's important to remember that it is a conspiracy theory to believe the media and Democrats (but I repeat myself) want to important as many undocumented Democrats as po
title: Marco Rubio, Tom Homan team up against media's latest attempt to simp for illegal immigrants... this time involving kids

description:
The White House Correspondents' Dinner was this past weekend. It's an annual event where the journalsimers who cover the White House gather to give each other reach arounds over how awesome they think they are, while praising their failing institution of being the enemy of the people. One of the award winners, Axios's Alex Thompson, went viral for lightly criticizing his peers for, maybe, not covering Joe Biden falling apart before our very eyes as rigorously as they should have.

The event was supposed to be hosted by comedian Amber Ruffin, but the WHCD decided that having a host who claims the Trump administration is a bunch of murderers might get in the way of the org trying to convince Americans the WHCD
title: Reporter declares media "should've done better" covering Biden's cognitive decline, and seriously... f*ck these people
